attributes.action: Undertake to breathalyze MPs whilst they are in the House on official business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently legislation has been enabled so that non professional sailors can be breathalysed if they are over the limit of 80mgs. It is my opinion that that it is equally important that MPs should not be under the influence when making "national" decisions and that legislation should be introduced to prevent them from drinking whilst they are on "watch" so to speak.
